markdown: ###### Moderate Positive reputation with RDC | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Dim Prospects | conc = | next = Overgrowth | internalname = FCT_QST_RDC02_Smugglers | guid = 8a1c2a0e-d242-4b6d-89be-6267e0d1c9d3 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [faction quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsFactionQuest/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Hazanui Karū asks the Watcher to pick up an important shipment and deliver it to the island of Sayuka. ## Walkthrough * Head over to [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/) and talk to the hazanui. As it turns out, the RDC is shorthanded due to the loss of [Hasongo](/hasongo/) and storms at home delaying the fleet. She will muse on the weather engineering uncovered at Poko Kohara, then ask you to meet [Widla](/widla/), a smuggler, at sea to deliver a special cargo to one of the greatest minds of Rauatai at [Sayuka](/sayuka/). Hazanui Karū hands you {{cp2|1000}}, as the already negotiated payment for the cargo, and sends you on your way. * Head west of Neketaka. [Widla](/widla/) and her dhow, ''[The Goshawk](/theGoshawk/)'', will automatically seek you out and make contact. Widla will demand a higher price than agreed for the crates, unless you have at least Good 2 reputation with the Principi. ** Without the necessary reputation, starting dialogue with the Insight option, mentioning that the "Royal Deadfire Company has a long memory", then exhausting all non-hostile dialogue will open dialogue with [Perin](/perin/); a Bluff 6 check will cause Widla to send Perin below deck, removing him if combat breaks out, or a Diplomacy 8 Bluff 6 check will cause Perin to mutiny, sending Widla below deck. Perin will offer the cargo for 1000, otherwise combat is easier as Widla is no longer present. ** If you chose to attack the crew, interact with the crates on deck to grab them and sail away. * Head for Sayuka. Once you make way, you will discover the crates contain a very special kind of cargo: [Iverra](/iverra/), a renowned Vailian scientist. You can talk to her to learn that she deliberately fled the Republics in a crate to test her air-recycling spell and to reach [Sayuka](/sayuka/), in order to help with the excavations there. * Upon safe delivery of the "cargo" to Sayuka, head to [Fleet Master Okaya](/fleetMasterOkaya/) in her quarters to complete the quest, netting you a measly {{cp2|350}} and Moderate Positive reputation with the RDC. ## Gallery Re si crewmemberwithcaptain.png | Loading the crates ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC02_Smugglers.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''A Matter of Import''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Hazanui Karū asked me to pick up an important shipment and deliver it to the island of Sayuka. |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''Alternate descriptions''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40001 | Hazanui Karū has requested my help with a sensitive matter. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Meet Widla at sea at the rendezvous location.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Widla and her crew are waiting at a predetermined spot west of Neketaka. I'm to meet her there to pick up the cargo. |- | rowspan="3" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Hazanui Karū in her office at the Brass Citadel.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Hazanui Karū has a job for me. Her office is on the main floor of Imperial Command at the Brass Citadel. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | The hazanui is currently meeting at Kahanga palace with the queen and Vailian leaders. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Fleet Master Okaya at Sayuka.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | I paid the smuggler's price and acquired the cargo. All that's left is to deliver it to the port of Sayuka. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | A scientist named Iverra was being smuggled in the cargo. She says she has business at Sayuka. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | I've arrived at Sayuka safely with Iverra. She's gone to ahead to meet her contacts. |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''4''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Fleet Master Okaya at Sayuka.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10004 | I killed the smugglers and took the cargo. All that's left is to deliver it to the port of Sayuka. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | A scientist named Iverra was being smuggled in the cargo. She says she has business at Sayuka. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | I've arrived at Sayuka safely with Iverra. She's gone to ahead to meet her contacts. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I delivered the cargo to Sayuka as instructed. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I have angered the Royal Deadfire Company and they now want nothing to do with me. |}
raw: {{Infobox quest poe2 | name = A Matter of Import | image = PE2 Widla.png | caption = | added_in = poe2 | quest_type = Faction quest | quest_region = Sayuka | quest_level = 8 | faction = Royal Deadfire Company | locations = Imperial Command;Sayuka | main_npcs = Hazanui Karū;Widla;Perin;Iverra;Fleet Master Okaya | companion = Maia Rua | quest_giver = Atsura;Hazanui Karū | xp_amount = 1000 | xp_type = Normal | xp_level = 8 | xp_weights = 1;1;1;1 | rewardname1 = Deliver the goods | reward1 = {{cp2|350}};Moderate Positive reputation with RDC | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = Dim Prospects | conc = | next = Overgrowth | internalname = FCT_QST_RDC02_Smugglers | guid = 8a1c2a0e-d242-4b6d-89be-6267e0d1c9d3 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire quests#Faction quest|faction quest]] in {{poe2}}. ==Synopsis== Hazanui Karū asks the Watcher to pick up an important shipment and deliver it to the island of Sayuka. ==Walkthrough== * Head over to [[Imperial Command]] and talk to the hazanui. Perin will offer the cargo for 1000, otherwise combat is easier as Widla is no longer present. ** If you chose to attack the crew, interact with the crates on deck to grab them and sail away. * Head for Sayuka. Once you make way, you will discover the crates contain a very special kind of cargo: [[Iverra]], a renowned Vailian scientist. You can talk to her to learn that she deliberately fled the Republics in a crate to test her air-recycling spell and to reach [[Sayuka]], in order to help with the excavations there. * Upon safe delivery of the "cargo" to Sayuka, head to [[Fleet Master Okaya]] in her quarters to complete the quest, netting you a measly {{cp2|350}} and Moderate Positive reputation with the RDC. ==Gallery== Re si crewmemberwithcaptain.png | Loading the crates ==Journal== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/XX_RDC_Faction_Questline/FCT_QST_RDC02_Smugglers.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''A Matter of Import''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Hazanui Karū asked me to pick up an important shipment and deliver it to the island of Sayuka. |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''Alternate descriptions''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 40001 | Hazanui Karū has requested my help with a sensitive matter. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Meet Widla at sea at the rendezvous location.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Widla and her crew are waiting at a predetermined spot west of Neketaka. title: A Matter of Import
